data.headline: UX Designer
data.summary: Passionate UX Designer with a strong background in academic research. Skilled in user-centered design, usability testing, and data analysis. Committed to creating intuitive and accessible digital experiences.

experience.title: UX Designer
bullets: Conducted user research, including interviews, surveys, and usability testing, to identify user needs and pain points.
Designed wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups to visualize and iterate on user flows and interface designs.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including developers and product managers, to ensure the implementation of user-centric solutions.
Presented research findings and design proposals to stakeholders, gaining buy-in and support for project initiatives.

experience.title: Research Assistant
bullets: Assisted professors in conducting literature reviews, data collection, and analysis for various research projects.
Contributed to the preparation of research papers and presentations, ensuring accurate and well-structured content.
Collaborated with interdisciplinary teams to identify and address research gaps, fostering innovative approaches.
Developed strong analytical and critical thinking skills through the research process.

experience.title: UX Design Intern
bullets: Participated in user research activities, including interviews and usability testing, to understand the needs of startup founders.
Designed low-fidelity wireframes and interactive prototypes to explore and validate design concepts.
Collaborated with the product and engineering teams to ensure the implementation of user-friendly features.
Gained hands-on experience in the full UX design process, from research to implementation.

experience.title: Research Assistant (Internship)
bullets: Assisted professors in conducting literature reviews and data analysis for various research projects.
Contributed to the preparation of research presentations and publications.
Developed strong research and analytical skills through hands-on experience.

projects.name: Accessibility Project
projects.description: Designed and tested a mobile app for visually impaired users, ensuring a high level of accessibility and usability.

projects.name: UX Redesign
projects.description: Conducted a comprehensive UX audit and redesign for a local e-commerce website, improving the user experience and increasing conversion rates.

interests: Exploring new design trends and technologies
Participating in design-related hackathons and meetups
